parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which you want to move the resource.
> You can use resource groups to facilitate resource grouping and permission management for an Alibaba Cloud. For more information, see [What is resource management?](~~158855~~)

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource for which you want to modify the resource group. Valid value: **ANYCASTEIPADDRESS**.
